ABOUT ME

I, Navdeep Kaur, come from the land of art,culture and science - INDIA. I belong to sikh family and have spent my whole childhood and teenage years in GUMTI KALAN,a small village in PUNJAB,a northwestern state in India.

I have moved to Canada for my higher studies away from my family in Punjab.I live here with my elder sister but we both miss our family members a lot as life was quite easy going because of the support and togetherness of the family members.i miss my dad the most as he has always been my strength.

I have always wanted to work in the field of technology as tech jobs often promote innovation and development,encouraging people to think of new things and see new possibilities.Also,I can see its tangible benefits and value of my

SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT has always fascinated me because this field is incredibly broad,fast-paced and innovative.The other reason is its high demand in the IT world of which there are great job opportunities available.

Enjoying life,learning new cooking recipes or new skills like money management or creating a website are my hobbies and i am at my best while doing all of these.
